FRANKENSTEIN.desc:
📡 TECHNICAL ORDERS:
1. Scan for BUFFS before engagement.
2. Fill rallies from the BOTTOM of the link-list.
3. Patch your wounds (HEAL) between waves.
4. DISABLE automatic rally functions—drones need manual precision.

💤 OFFLINE MODE:
If your signal is fading, set 'Participate Offline' on the event grid to secure your rewards.

CAPITAL.desc:
📡 TECHNICAL ORDERS:

NO SOLO ATTACKS: Solo trucks (11k) vs Capital (70k) is suicide. Rally only.
COMMANDER SCALING: Only the Rally Leader’s Tech/Heroes count.
LEADERSHIP: Only the 5 strongest survivors CREATE rallies.
TIER CHECK: T10+ for Capital. T9+ for Turrets.

🚛 FIELD OPS:

JOINERS: Use your Main Formation to JOIN active rallies.
DEFENSE: Use 3rd/4th Formations to REINFORCE structures we hold.
WARNING: Low-tier troops (T8) weaken the entire garrison. Do not join.
